jobActivity.title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Solution Architect ; Reference 43856
jobActivity.body:
2 attachments (725 KB) Download all Hello Chester,
Thanks for your reply.
I called you yesterday according to the reply in order to talk way of forward for any opportunity in your pipeline. I dropped a message since i could not reach you out :( , I am sorry for that....
I will be very happy to talk to you on my application and disuss any other possible opportunities.
Please do not hesitate to keep in touch.
regards,
Muhammet ATALAY +44 (0) 7721 608414
B&B Information Technologies Services Ltd.
https://www.bbtechnologies.co.uk.
